short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: XPage新标签页，提供独创的完全自由的可扩展布局，可任意拖动、放置零件及各种图标；提供独创的搜索功能，能在数十种搜索服务中快速切换。此外，还提供各式各样的小零件，如新闻、日历、节假日、生日本、世界时钟、纪念日等，同时，XPage也是管理书签收藏网址的便捷工具。
short.en: XPage just support Chinese for now, it will provide English version in the future.XPage is a free and powerful new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
XPage新标签页，与其他新标签页最大的区别有两点，一是提供了完全自由丝滑的布局，您可以在XPage中自由拖动任意尺寸的图标至任意位置，XPage都将自动调整布局；二是提供了方便快捷的搜索功能，您可以根据自己的偏好，构建个性化的搜索服务组合，也可以在数十种搜索服务中快速切换，还能快速搜索个人收藏的网址；

除此之外，XPage也是您管理收藏网址和书签的利器；
在外观上，XPage也提供了大量的壁纸供您选择使用；
最后，XPage也提供了大量的零件供您选择使用，如时事热点、竞技新闻、电子竞技、日历、节假日、搬砖侠、天气、汇率、股票等等。
long.en:
The XPage new tab stands out from other new tabs in two significant ways. Firstly, it offers a completely free and smooth layout where you can freely drag icons of any size to any position, and XPage will automatically adjust the layout. Secondly, it provides a convenient and fast search function, allowing you to build a personalized combination of search services according to your preferences. You can also quickly switch among dozens of search services and rapidly search for personally bookmarked websites.

In addition, XPage is a powerful tool for managing bookmarked websites; aesthetically, it provides a wide range of wallpapers for your selection. Lastly, XPage offers a variety of components for you to choose from, such as current events, sports news, esports, calendar, holidays, productivity tools, weather, exchange rates, stocks, and more.
